amendatorysection.catchline: Records and information; confidential; unauthorized disclosure; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: All records and information regarding foster children and their parents or relatives in the possession of the office or local board shall be deemed confidential. Unauthorized disclosure of such confidential records and information or any violation of the rules and regulations adopted and promulgated by the Department of Health and Human Services or the office shall be a Class III misdemeanor.
